<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.ParameterScreenRefQuals</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description/> <name>ParameterScreenRefQuals</name> <script><![CDATA[var ParameterScreenRefQuals = Class.create(); ParameterScreenRefQuals.prototype = { forInputPage: function() { if (current.parameter_screen == "") return "";
else return "parameter_screen=" + current.parameter_screen; },
forSectionPage: function() { return this.forInputPage(); },
type: 'ParameterScreenRefQuals' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-03-01 02:17:20</sys_created_on> <sys_id>3294a076536220100874ddeeff7b122e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>ParameterScreenRefQuals</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Mobile Parameter Screen Plugin" source="com.glide.sg.parameter">3dedb8cb6d2220100acb70b353433083</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3294a076536220100874ddeeff7b122e</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-03-01 02:17:20</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>343</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
